snippet: A symbolic vote in Parliament to allow greater foreign investment in India’s retail sector.
abstract: A symbolic vote in Parliament to allow greater foreign investment in India’s retail sector.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI — “India’s lower house of Parliament voted in a raucous session on Wednesday evening to support the government’s decision to allow Walmart and other major retailers to set up shop here,” Gardiner Harris wrote in The New York Times.

headline.main: India’s Lower House Votes to Support Foreign Investment
